response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $150 by many of our customers. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that suits both of us. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product for $135. This price reflects its true value while allowing for a reasonable profit margin for me. I look forward to your response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 135}
